title: Game freeze
body:
So I recently got a new graphics card and when playing league (and a few other games) it'll freeze up for about 10 to 15 seconds and the screen will go black, then it'll stop, it happens randomly and about three or four times a game, does anyone know what might be causing this or a possible fix? it makes league extremely hard and it's pretty tilting

Cheers

replies.body:
It sounds like your card may be experiencing some driver issues or power problems. I'd recommend working through the steps listed inside our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure that those factors are not at play.

Let me know if this helped. ^.^

I tried them all still freezing I think it's a hardware problem not a software one.

Cheers

If you'd like, you can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our tech specialists can walk you through testing your hardware for failure if you need help.

Let me know if you have any questions.
